|brand = Check Point |model = VPN-1 Edge |submodelappend = yes |submodel = W |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = SBXW-166LHGE-4 |wlclass = G54 |series = Edge |type = security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = P6XSBXW-166LHGE-4 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = GC-SVPNW |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Brecis;MSP2100; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS32 |cpu1_type_rev = 4Km |cpu1spd = 170<!-- 166 / 200MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = 2 |fla1chip = AMD;Am29DL640D; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = ICSI;IC42S16160-6TG; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP102; |eth3chip = IC+;IP102; |sw1chip = IC+;IP175C; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:08:DA |oui = 00:08:DA
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (57600 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP4
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, metal case, heatsink |addchip = CMOS Real Time Clock;Philips;PCF8563;;1;,,, 4-ports USB 2.0 Host Controller;VIA;VT6212L;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3243C;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;ANPEC;APL1117;;1;,,, 700mA Low Dropout Fixed Voltage Regulator;ANPEC;APL5708R;;1;,,, Single Synchronous Buck PWM DC-DC Controller;Richtek;RT9202;;1;,,, 20V 6A Dual N-Channel Enhancement Mode MOSFET;ANPEC;APM7312;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.10.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = g u e [ ] s t h i s |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/06/2004 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Gigabyte GN-WIAG01 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR5213; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR2112; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Brecis]]'' MSP2100 [[MIPS32]] 4Km (@170MHz) *Memory: 64MB (SDRAM) *Storage: 16MB Flash *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR5213/AR2112 (802.11bg) *Network: 6x Fast Ethernet *USB: 2x USB 2.0 (Type A) ports
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Check Point VPN-1 Edge W Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Check Point VPN-1 Edge W Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
